MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30pm in order to safely replace an electricity pole in the Danduff area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50pm on Friday, 05 February 2021
